subject: RE: [junit] Problems when Getting started
msgSnippet: Hi Jimmi, The classpath should also have the current directory as found below. Update the classpath as below and verify. CLASSPATH to:
messageBody:
Hi Jimmi,

The classpath should also have the current directory as found below. Update the classpath as below and verify.

CLASSPATH to: C:\junit4.1\junit-4.1.jar; C:\junit4.1\ ;.

Thanks
Prathap

-----Original Message-----
From: junit@yahoogroups.com [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com]On Behalf Of
jimmi1311
Sent: Wednesday, September 20, 2006 11:41 AM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] Problems when Getting started


Hello anyone

I want to start using Junit. I have unpacked the junit4.1 and set the
CLASSPATH to: C:\junit4.1\junit-4.1.jar; C:\junit4.1\

But when I try to run the test a get this:

C:\junit4.1\junit\tests>java AllTests.class
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError:AllTests/class

I can't find the problem. Can anyone help??

Kind regards
Jimmi Wolff
